caseTitle: Commissioner Inland Revenue, Lahore v. M/s Millat Tractors Limited, Lahore
authorJudge: Mr. Justice Syed Mansoor Ali Shah
tagline: (1)  The proceedings under Section 111 and 122 of the Income Tax Ordinance, 2001 (“Ordinance”) are different and distinguishable in nature and cannot be subsumed. The proceedings under Section 111 have to be culminated first before the proceedings under Section 122 can be initiated and proceeded with. (2) Effect of the Explanation added to Section 111 of the Ordinance.
